productName: HL-T4000DW A3 Inkjet Printer, Refill Ink Tank Wireless Duplex Print Efficiency Engineered - A3 Refill Ink Tank Printer with Wireless & Ethernet Connectivity, Automatic 2-sided Colour Print, Professionally Designed for Fast Print Speeds, Low Cost High Photo Quality with Ultra High Yield Ink Bottles, Wi-Fi Direct, Mobile & USB Print
